sections.Situation: Conan, Ran, Kogoro, and Sonoko travel to the island of Shikoku, Kagawa Prefecture, to see the kabuki play Phantom of the Konpira at the restored Konpira Grand Theatre. It is a play based on The Phantom of the Opera. Things start to mimic the play. There are requests for a heroine change, sightings of a phantom, and a deliberate attempt on the heroine, just like Phantom of the Opera. The chief of the stage setting is killed, and the chairman and the sponsor are arrested by circumstantial evidence.
